This <lb n="c57-0046__main__4"/>was the hour & moment of trial <lb n="c57-0046__main__5"/>which <del rend="strikethrough">was to</del><add place="sublinear"><metamark function="insert">^</metamark></add><add place="superlinear">would</add> decide my <del rend="strikethrough">fea</del> hopes <lb n="c57-0046__main__6"/><del rend="strikethrough">or</del><unclear extent="1" unit="chars"></unclear><del rend="strikethrough">I quitted my hovel with trem</del> The <lb n="c57-0046__main__7"/>servants <del rend="strikethrough">of the cottage</del> were gone <lb n="c57-0046__main__8"/>to a neighbouring fair:– All was <lb n="c57-0046__main__9"/>silent

and around the cottage <lb n="c57-0046__main__10"/>It was an excellent opportunity <lb n="c57-0046__main__11"/>yet when I <del rend="strikethrough">rose</del><add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear">proceeded</add> to execute my plan <lb n="c57-0046__main__12"/>my limbs failed me, and I sunk <lb n="c57-0046__main__13"/>to the ground. Again I rose and <lb n="c57-0046__main__14"/><del rend="strikethrough">with with</del><anchor xml:id="c57-0046.01"/><zone corresp="#c57-0046.01" type="left_margin"><lb n="c57-0046__left_margin__1"/><add>exerting
